review: I literally use this every day. I have cable with every channel available but some how there's still a lot of nothing a lot of the time. I only use this for netflix on my tv. i spent a large chunk on a smart tv and i do love it but still had a great hd tv, so when found this i thought id give it a try. It works great. i intend to buy another for my backroom. For now i just move it with me. its easy to set up. although honestly i connected it to the tv and had my husband connect it from that point to our devices. I recommend this to everyone. If you have an hdmi port i see no reason to have to buy smart tvs thanks to this little device.
